root.title: k mart km februari sale 8.2 pct
root.body: k mart corp sai februari sale rise 13.1 pct year ago compar store sale four week period end februari 25 rise 8.2 pct k mart sai consolid sale period 1.46 billion dlr compar 1.29 billion last year sai year ago figur exclud sale discontinu oper k mart cite favor consum respons merchandis program sai specialti retail excel februari sale
